sentences.text: NOTICE OF ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS To Be Held on April 5, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To our shareholders:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are cordially invited to attend, and NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN of, the 2017 Annual General Meeting of Shareholders (the 2017 AGM) of Broadcom Limited (Broadcom), which will be held at our subsidiarys offices located at 1320 Ridder Park Drive, San Jose, California 95131, U.S.A., at 11:00 a.m., Pacific Time, on Wednesday, April 5, 2017, for the following purposes, as more fully described in the proxy statement accompanying this notice (the Proxy Statement):
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As Ordinary Business
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. To elect each of the following persons to our board of directors (the Board), to serve until the next annual general meeting of shareholders:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) Mr. Hock E. Tan;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) Mr. James V. Diller;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) Mr. Lewis C. Eggebrecht;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (d) Mr. Kenneth Y. Hao;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (e) Mr. Eddy W. Hartenstein;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (f) Mr. Check Kian Low;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (g) Mr. Donald Macleod;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (h) Mr. Peter J. Marks; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) Dr. Henry Samueli.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. To approve the re-appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP to serve as our independent registered public accounting firm and independent Singapore auditor for the fiscal year ending October 29, 2017, and to authorize the Audit Committee of the Board to fix PricewaterhouseCoopers LLPs remuneration for services provided through our 2018 Annual General Meeting of Shareholders (the 2018 AGM).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As Special Business
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. To pass the following as an Ordinary Resolution:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED THAT, pursuant to the provisions of Section 161 of the Singapore Companies Act, Chapter 50 (the Singapore Companies Act), and also subject otherwise to the provisions of the Singapore Companies Act and our Constitution, authority be, and hereby is, given to our directors:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) allot and issue ordinary shares in our capital;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) subject to the provisions of our Constitution, allot and issue Special Preference Shares (as defined below) bearing the rights and obligations as set out in our Constitution; and/or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) make or grant offers, agreements, options or other instruments (including the grant of awards or options pursuant to our equity-based incentive plans and agreements in effect or assumed from time to time) that might or would require ordinary shares to be allotted and issued, whether such allotment or issuance would occur during or after the expiration of this authority (including, but not limited to, the creation and issuance of warrants, rights, units, purchase contracts, debentures or other instruments (including debt instruments) convertible or exchangeable into ordinary shares),
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: at any time to and/or with such persons and upon such terms and conditions, for such purposes and for such consideration as our directors may in their sole discretion deem fit, and with such rights or restrictions as our directors ma think fit to impose and as are set forth in our Constitution; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) to allot and issue shares in our capital pursuant to any offer, agreement, award or other instrument made, granted or authorized by our directors while this resolution is or was in effect, regardless of whether the authority conferred by this resolution may have ceased to be in effect at the time of the allotment and issuance,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: nd that such authority, if approved by our shareholders, continue in effect until the earlier of the conclusion of our 2018 AGM or he expiration of the period within which our 2018 AGM is required by law to be held.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. To consider and put to a non-binding, advisory vote, the following resolution:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED THAT, shareholders approve, on an advisory basis, the compensation of Broadcoms named executive officers, as disclosed in Compensation Discussion and Analysis and in the compensation tables and accompanying narrative disclosure under Executive Compensation in the accompanying Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This resolution is being proposed to shareholders as required pursuant to Section 14A of the U.S. Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the Exchange Act).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The shareholders vote on this resolution is advisory and non-binding in nature, will have no legal effect and will not be enforceable against Broadcom or our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. To consider and put to a non-binding, advisory vote the following resolution:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED THAT, shareholders recommend that a non-binding, advisory vote to approve the compensation of Broadcoms named executive officers be put to shareholders for their consideration with one of the following three frequencies:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) every one year;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) every two years; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) every three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This resolution is being proposed to shareholders as required pursuant to Section 14A of the Exchange Act.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The shareholders vote on this resolution is advisory and non-binding in nature, will have no legal effect and will not be enforceable against Broadcom or our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As Ordinary Business
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6. To transact any other business as may properly be transacted at the 2017 AGM.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notes About the 2017 Annual General Meeting of Shareholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Singapore Statutory Financial Statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the 2017 AGM, our shareholders will have the opportunity to discuss and ask questions regarding our Singapore audited financial statements for our fiscal year ended October 30, 2016, together with the directors tatement and auditors report thereon, in compliance with the laws of Singapore.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholder approval of our Singapore audited nancial statements is not being sought by the Proxy Statement and will not be sought at the 2017 AGM.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Materials on the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are pleased to take advantage of Securities and Exchange Commission rules that allow issuers to furnish proxy materials to some or all of their shareholders on the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with Singapore law, our registered shareholders (shareholders of record who own our ordinary shares in their own name registered with our transfer agent, Computershare Trust Company, N.A. (Computershare)) are not able to vote their shares over the Internet, but we provide this service to our beneficial owners (shareholders whose ordinary shares are held by a broker, a bank or other nominee).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe these rules allow us to provide our shareholders with the information they need, while lowering the costs of delivery and reducing the environmental impact of our annual general meeting of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Receipt of Notice; Eligibility to Vote at Annual General Meeting of Shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has fixed the close of business on February 8, 2017, as the record date for determining which of our shareholders are entitled to receive copies of this notice and the accompanying Proxy Statement or the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, only holders of our ordinary shares and the holder of our non-economic voting preference shares (Special Voting Shares or Special Preference Shares) on April 5, 2017 will be entitled to vote at the 2017 AGM.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representation at the 2017 AGM of shareholders entitled to vote, in person or by proxy or by representative, and holding among them at least a majority of all issued and outstanding ordinary shares and Special Voting Shares, treated as a single class, is required to constitute a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, it is important that your shares be represented at the 2017 AGM, either in person or by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A registered shareholder, entitled to attend and vote at the 2017 AGM, is entitled to appoint one or more proxies to attend the meeting and vote on his or her behalf.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A proxy need not also be a shareholder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you plan to attend the meeting, please complete, date and sign the enclosed proxy card and return it in the enclosed envelope.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A registered shareholder may revoke his or her proxy at any time prior to the time it is voted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registered shareholders who are present at the meeting may (but are not required) to revoke their proxies and vote in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The collection, use and disclosure by us and our agents, representatives and service providers of a shareholders, and their proxies or representatives, personal data in connection with the 2017 AGM and related solicitation of proxies is governed by Article 102 of our Constitution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner of ordinary shares, you may vote by proxy over the Internet by following the instructions provided in the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials, or, if you requested printed copies of the proxy materials by mail, you may vote by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders of restricted exchangeable units in our subsidiary, Broadcom Cayman, L.P. (the Partnership), may instruct Computershare, as the registered shareholder of all of the outstanding Special Voting Shares, how to vote their corresponding number of Special Voting Shares, in accordance with the Voting Trust Agreement, dated February 1, 2016, by and among Broadcom, the Partnership and Computershare as trustee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For detailed information regarding eligibility to vote at, and voting procedures for, the 2017 AGM, please refer to Voting Rights and Solicitation of Proxies, starting on page 1 of the accompanying Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR ADMISSION TO THE ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING, EACH SHAREHOLDER WILL BE ASKED TO PRESENT VALID PICTURE IDENTIFICATION, SUCH AS A DRIVERS LICENSE OR PASSPORT, AND PROOF OF OWNERSHIP OF OUR ORDINARY SHARES AS OF THE MEETING DATE, SUCH AS A RECENT BROKERAGE STATEMENT, REFLECTING SHARE OWNERSHIP, OR A LEGAL PROXY TO VOTE SPECIAL VOTING SHARES FROM COMPUTERSHARE TRUST COMPANY N.A. PLEASE SEE PAGE 3 OF THE PROXY STATEMENT FOR MORE INFORMATION.

sentences.text: ELECTRONIC DELIVERY OF OUR SHAREHOLDER COMMUNICATIONS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We strongly encourage our shareholders to conserve natural resources, as well as significantly reduce our printing and mailing costs, by signing up to receive shareholder communications via e-mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With electronic delivery, we will notify you when our annual reports and proxy statements are available on the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Electronic delivery can also help reduce the number of bulky documents in your personal files and eliminate duplicate mailings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To sign up for electronic delivery:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. If you are a registered shareholder (i.e., you hold your Broadcom ordinary shares in your own name through our transfer agent, Computershare Trust Company, N.A.), to enroll visit: www-us.computershare.com/investor/ or call (877) 373-6374 within the U.S., U.S. Territories and Canada, or +1 (781) 575-3100 outside the U.S., U.S. Territories and Canada.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. If you are a beneficial holder (i.e., your ordinary shares are held by a broker, bank or other nominee), the voting instruction form provided by most brokers or banks will contain instructions for enrolling in electronic delivery.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your electronic delivery enrollment will be effective until you cancel it.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you have questions about electronic delivery, please call Computershare at the number above or your broker or bank.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROXY STATEMENT for the 2017 ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING of SHAREHOLDERS of BROADCOM LIMITED
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To Be Held on Wednesday, April 5, 2017 11:00 a.m. (Pacific Time) at our subsidiarys offices located at 1320 Ridder Park Drive, San Jose, California 95131, U.S.A.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are making this proxy statement (the Proxy Statement) available in connection with the solicitation by the board of directors of Broadcom Limited (the Board) of proxies to be voted at the 2017 Annual General Meeting of Shareholders, or at any adjournments or postponements thereof (the 2017 AGM), for the purposes set forth in the accompanying Notice of Annual General Meeting of Shareholders (the Notice).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broadcom Limited is the successor to Avago Technologies Limited (Avago).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Following Avagos acquisition of Broadcom Corporation (BRCM) on February 1, 2016 (the Acquisition), Broadcom Limited became the ultimate parent holding company of Avago and BRCM.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Information reported in this Proxy Statement for the period prior to the Acquisition relates to our predecessor, Avago.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless the context otherwise requires, references in this Proxy Statement to Broadcom, the Company, our Company, we, our, us and similar terms are to Broadcom Limited from and after the effective time of the Acquisition and, prior to that time, to our predecessor, Avago.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Mailing.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proxy Statement, the enclosed Proxy Card and the Notice were first made available on or about February 17, 2017 to our shareholders as of February 8, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Costs of Solicitation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will bear the cost of soliciting proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have retained Okapi Partners LLC, an independent proxy solicitation firm, to assist us in soliciting proxies for an estimated fee of $12,500 plus reimbursement of reasonable expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We and/or our agents, including certain of our officers, directors and employees, may solicit proxies by mail, telephone, e-mail, fax or in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No additional compensation will be paid to our officers, directors or employees for such services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will reimburse banks, brokerage firms and other custodians, nominees, trustees and fiduciaries for reasonable out-of-pocket expenses incurred by them in sending proxy materials to and soliciting proxies from beneficial holders of our ordinary shares or non-economic voting preference shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Registered Office.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The mailing address of our registered office is 1 Yishun Avenue 7, Singapore 768923.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please note, however, that any communications from holders of our ordinary shares should be directed to the attention of our General Counsel at the offices of our subsidiary, Avago Technologies U.S. Inc., at 1320 Ridder Park Drive, San Jose, California 95131, U.S.A.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Financial Statements; Presentation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the laws of Singapore, our Singapore statutory financial statements for our fiscal year ended October 30, 2016 are provided with this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except as otherwise stated herein, all monetary amounts in this Proxy Statement have been presented in U.S. dollars.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: VOTING RIGHTS AND SOLICITATION OF PROXIES
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have two classes of shares outstanding,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) our ordinary shares, no par value, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) our non-economic voting preference shares, no par value (the Special Voting Shares or Special Preference Shares), with each class of shares having one vote per share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All Special Voting Shares outstanding are held by Computershare Trust Company, N.A. (Computershare) pursuant to the Voting Trust Agreement, dated February 1, 2016 (the Voting Trust), among Broadcom,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broadcom Cayman L.P., a subsidiary of Broadcom (the Partnership), and Computershare, as trustee (the Trustee).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The number of Special Voting Shares outstanding is equal to the number of outstanding restricted exchangeable units in the Partnership (the Restricted Units), which were issued in connection with the Acquisition.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of February 1, 2017, the Restricted Units are exchangeable for our ordinary shares, on a one-for-one basis, which obligation we may elect to settle either in cash or in ordinary shares, at our option.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ordinary shares and Special Voting Shares issued and outstanding on April 5, 2017 are entitled to be voted at the 2017 AGM, voting together as a single class, on each matter being put before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a holder of Restricted Units, you are entitled to direct the Trustee to vote one Special Voting Share for each Restricted Unit that you hold, pursuant to the terms of the Voting Trust.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Record Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The close of business on February 8, 2017, is the record date for holders of our ordinary shares and Special Voting Shares entitled to receive notice of the 2017 AGM (the Record Date).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of the Record Date, we had 401,038,999 ordinary shares and 22,804,591 Special Voting Shares issued and outstanding, and there were 22,804,591 Restricted Units in the Partnership issued and outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting Instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless otherwise noted below, voting instructions for all ordinary shares and Special Voting Shares must be received by 9:00 a.m. (Pacific Time) on April 3, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ordinary Shares
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your ordinary shares are registered directly in your name with our transfer agent, Computershare, you are considered the registered shareholder with respect to those shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held by a brokerage firm, bank, trustee or other nominee, you are considered the beneficial owner of shares held in street name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registered Holders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A registered shareholder entitled to attend and vote at the 2017 AGM may vote in person at the meeting or by completing and returning the enclosed proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A registered shareholder has the right to revoke his or her proxy at any time prior to voting at the 2017 AGM by:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) submitting a subsequently dated proxy, which, if not delivered in person at the meeting, must be received by us c/o Proxy Services, c/o Computershare Investor Services, P.O. Box 43101, Providence, RI 02940-5067, no later than 9:00 a.m. (Pacific Time) on April 3, 2017; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ii) by attending the meeting and voting in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are an institution holding your shares in a participant account with The Depository Trust Company (DTC), vote your shares through DTCs procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may not vote your shares in person at the 2017 AGM unless you obtain a legal proxy from DTC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial Owners
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner of shares, you have the right to instruct the broker, bank or other nominee that holds your shares on how to vote them.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your broker, bank or nominee will send you a voting instruction form for you to use to direct how your shares should be voted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your shares must be voted by such time as may be specified by your broker, bank or nominee, which may be earlier than 9:00 a.m. (Pacific Time) on April 3, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you wish to change or revoke your voting instructions, you must contact your broker, bank or other nominee holding your ordinary shares and follow their instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may not vote your shares in person at the 2017 AGM unless you obtain a legal proxy from your broker, bank or other nominee giving you the right to vote the shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold ordinary shares as, or through, a participant in DTC, we understand that in order for your vote to be counted at the 2017 AGM, you must have been a holder of ordinary shares as at, and with effect from the
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Record Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you become a beneficial owner of ordinary shares after the Record Date but before the meeting date and you wish to vote your shares, you must become a registered shareholder prior to the meeting date and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) request a proxy card and return it to Computershare Investor Services in accordance with the procedures noted above or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) attend the meeting and vote in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please contact your broker, bank or other nominee holding your shares if you wish to become a registered shareholder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Special Voting Shares
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only the Trustee may vote Special Voting Shares, either by proxy or in person at the 2017 AGM.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold Restricted Units, you must instruct the Trustee on how to vote your corresponding number of Special Voting Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Trustee will inform you as to the manner in which such voting instructions are to be given to the Trustee, including the date and time by which such instructions must be received by the Trustee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you wish to change or revoke your voting instructions, you must contact the Trustee and follow the Trustees nstructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not provide instructions to the Trustee on how to vote the Special Voting Shares corresponding to your Restricted Units, those shares will not be voted at the 2017 AGM.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may not vote at or attend the 2017 AGM unless you obtain a legal proxy from the Trustee, giving you the right to vote your corresponding number of Special Voting Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you exchange any Restricted Units after the Record Date but prior to the 2017 AGM, a corresponding number of Special Voting Shares will be cancelled; and the related voting rights under the Voting Trust with respect to those Restricted Units will be terminated and will not be exercised at the 2017 AGM.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you receive ordinary shares upon exchange of your Restricted Units and you wish to vote those shares at the 2017 AGM, you must become a registered shareholder prior to the meeting date and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) request a proxy card and return it to Computershare Investor Services in accordance with the procedures noted above or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) attend the meeting and vote in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please contact your broker, bank or other nominee holding your shares if you wish to become a registered shareholder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meeting Attendance and Admission.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a registered shareholder on April 5, 2017, you are entitled to attend the 2017 AGM.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner of shares held in street name, in order to attend the 2017 AGM you will need to bring a letter or recent account statement from that broker, bank or other nominee that confirms that you are the beneficial owner of those shares, as well as a picture identification, such as a valid drivers license or passport, for purposes of personal identification.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders of Restricted Units wishing to attend the 2017 AGM must bring a legal proxy from the Trustee in respect of the corresponding number of Special Voting Shares, as well as picture identification, such as a valid drivers license or passport, for purposes of personal identification.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representation at the 2017 AGM of shareholders entitled to vote, in person or by proxy or representative, and holding among them at least a majority of all issued and outstanding ordinary shares and Special Voting Shares, treated as a single class, is required to constitute a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ordinary shares and Special Voting Shares represented by proxies that are properly executed and received by us in accordance with the instructions set forth in the Notice will be voted by the individuals named thereinHock E. Tan, Thomas H. Krause Jr. or Patricia H. McCall or any of them, with full power of substitution (together, the Proxy Holders)at the 2017 AGM in accordance with the shareholders instructions set forth in the proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A proxy holder need not also be a shareholder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The collection, use and disclosure by us and our agents, representatives and service providers of a shareholders, and their proxies or representatives, personal data in connection with the 2017 AGM and related solicitation of proxies is governed by Article 102 of our Constitution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you sign and return your proxy but do not indicate how your ordinary shares are to be voted, then shares represente y proxies will be voted by the Proxy Holders in accordance with our Boards recommendations as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the election of each of our Board nominees named in Proposals 1(a) to 1(i);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR each of Proposals 2 to 4; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: every ONE year for Proposal 5.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management does not know of any matters to be presented at the 2017 AGM other than those set forth in this Proxy Statement and in the accompanying Notice, nor have we received notice of any matter by the deadline prescribed by Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) Rule 14a-4(c).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Without limiting our ability to apply the advance notice provisions in our Constitution with respect to the procedures that must be followed for a matter to be properly presented at an annual general meeting of shareholders, if other matters should properly come before the 2017 AGM, the Proxy Holders will vote on such matters in accordance with their best judgment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Required Vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders of ordinary shares and Special Voting Shares will vote together as a single class for each of the proposals to be voted upon at the 2017 AGM.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The vote required for each proposal is as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposals 1(a) to (i) (election of directors):  Majority of votes cast Proposal 2 (re-appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP):  Majority of votes cast Proposal 3 (authorization of share allotments and issuances):  Majority of votes cast Proposal 4 (advisory vote on executive compensation):  Majority of votes cast Proposal 5 (advisory vote on the frequency of shareholders vote on executive compensation):     Majority of votes cast; however, if none of the alternatives receives a majority vote, we will consider the alternative receiving the highest number of votes to be the frequency selected by our shareholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposals 4 and 5 are being proposed to shareholders as required pursuant to Section 14A of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the Exchange Act).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders votes on Proposals 4 and 5 are advisory and non-binding in nature, will have no legal effect and will not be enforceable against us or our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and Broker Non-Votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes are counted in determining whether a quorum is present at the 2017 AGM, but are not counted in, and have no effect on, determining whether a proposal has been approved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A broker non-vote occurs when a broker, bank or other nominee holding ordinary shares on behalf of a beneficial owner cannot vote those shares because it (1) has not received voting instructions from such beneficial owner and (2) lacks discretionary voting power to vote those shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner of ordinary shares, your broker, bank or other nominee is entitled to vote your shares on routine matters, even if it does not receive voting instructions from you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The routine matters to be voted on at the 2017 AGM are Proposals 2 and 3.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Without instructions from the beneficial owner, a broker, bank or other nominee will not be entitled to vote shares held for a beneficial owner on Proposals 1(a) to (i), 4 and 5, which are non-routine matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting Procedures and Tabulation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have appointed a representative of Computershare as the inspector of elections of the 2017 AGM.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The inspector of elections will determine the number of ordinary shares and Special Voting Shares outstanding and represented at the 2017 AGM and the validity of proxies and ballots, and will count and tabulate all votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The determination of the inspector as to the validity of proxies will be final and binding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 1: ELECTION OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to the Singapore Companies Act, Chapter 50 (the Singapore Companies Act) and our Constitution, our Board must have at least one director who is ordinarily resident in Singapore.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to our Constitution, our Board may consist of no more than 13 directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board currently consists of 10 members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On February 13, 2017, Ms. Page informed our Board that she will not be standing for re-election at the 2017 AGM.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has decided that no other nominee for election will be named in Ms. Pages place and as a result, nine directors are being nominated for election at the 2017 AGM.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With effect from the 2017 AGM our Board will consist of nine members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Nominees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each director is elected annually at the annual general meeting of shareholders to hold office until the next annual general meeting of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon the recommendation of the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee, our Board has nominated the nine individuals below for election as directors, all of whom are currently directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board expects that each of the nominees listed below will be available to serve as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders may not vote their proxies for a greater number of persons than the number of nominees named below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In considering whether the director nominees have the experience, qualifications, attributes and skills, taken as a whole, to serve as directors of Broadcom, in light of our business and structure, the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee and our Board focused primarily on the information discussed in each of the director nominees biographical information set forth below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board believes that each nominee has relevant experience, personal and professional integrity, the ability to make independent, analytical inquiries, experience with and understanding of our business and business environment and willingness and ability to devote adequate time to Board duties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also believe that the director nominees together have the skills and experience to form a board that is well suited to oversee our Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following table sets forth certain information concerning the nominees for directors of Broadcom as of February 14, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) Hock E. Tan Age 65
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Tan has served as our President and Chief Executive Officer since March 2006.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From September 2005 to January 2008, he served as Chairman of the board of directors of Integrated Device Technology, Inc. (IDT).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to becoming chairman of IDT, Mr. Tan was the President and Chief Executive Officer of Integrated Circuit Systems, Inc. (ICS), from June 1999 to September 2005.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to ICS, Mr. Tan was Vice President of Finance with Commodore International, Ltd. from 1992 to 1994, and previously held senior management positions with PepsiCo, Inc. and General Motors Corporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Tan served as managing director of Pacven Investment, Ltd., a venture capital fund in Singapore from 1988 to 1992, and served as managing director for Hume Industries Ltd. in Malaysia from 1983 to 1988.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Tans qualifications to serve on our Board include his role as our Chief Executive Officer, his extensive career in the technology industry in general and in the semiconductor industry in particular, including service as the chairman of the board of directors of a publicly-traded semiconductor company, and his extensive knowledge of our business developed over the course of his career at our Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) James V. Diller Age 81 Chairman of the Board Director since April 2006
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Diller was a founder of PMC-Sierra, Inc., serving as PMCs Chief Executive Officer from 1983 to July 1997 and President from 1983 to July 1993.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Diller also served as a director of PMC since its formation in 1983 until December 2013.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Diller was Chairman of PMCs board of directors from July 1993 until February 2000, and was its Vice Chairman from February 2000 until December 2013.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Diller served as a director of Intersil Corporation from May 2002 to April 2015 and as its interim President and Chief Executive Officer from December 2012 to March 2013.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Dillers qualifications to serve on our Board include his more than 50 years of experience in semiconductor company management and oversight in positions such as Chief Executive Officer, President and General Manager and chairman of the board of directors, and his experience as a product development engineer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Eggebrecht served as Vice President and Chief Scientist of ICS from 1998 through May 2003.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Eggebrecht has held various other technical and executive management positions for more than 30 years, including as Chief Multimedia Architect at Phillips Semiconductor Manufacturing Inc., as Graphics Architect at S3 Graphics Limited, and Vice President of Research and Development at Commodore International Limited, and as a small systems architect for 15 years at International Business Machines Corporation (IBM).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While at IBM, Mr. Eggebrecht was the Chief Architect and Design Team Leader on the original IBM PC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He has also previously served on the board of directors of a number of public and private companies, including, most recently, as a director of IDT, where he served as a director from 2005 to 2012, and as a director of ICS from 2003 to 2005.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Eggebrecht holds six patents on the IBM PC and has authored two books on PC architecture, over 20 IBM Technical Disclosure Bulletins and trade press articles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He also serves on the board of directors of a number of private companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Eggebrechts qualifications to serve on our Board include his extensive experience in personal computer architecture, integrated circuit design and networking, wireless and timing technologies, as well as his experience serving on the board of directors of other public technology companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Hao is a Managing Partner and Managing Director of Silver Lake Partners (Silver Lake).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining Silver Lake in 2000, Mr. Hao was an investment banker with Hambrecht & Quist for 10 years, most recently serving as a Managing Director in the Technology Investment Banking group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Hao has spent his career investing in and advising technology companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Hao also serves or has served on the board of directors of a number of Silver Lake portfolio companies, including Symantec Corporation, where he also serves on its compensation and leadership development committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Haos qualifications to serve on our Board include his depth of experience in financial and investment matters and his familiarity with a broad range of companies in technology industries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Hartenstein was the publisher and Chief Executive Officer of the Los Angeles Times from August 2008 to August 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, he served as co-President of the Tribune Company from October 2010 to May 2011 and as President and Chief Executive Officer from May 2011 to January 2013.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Previously, Mr. Hartenstein was Vice Chairman and a member of the board of directors of The DIRECTV Group Inc. (formerly Hughes Electronics Corp.), from December 2003 until his retirement in December 2004.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He served as Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of DIRECTV Inc. from late 2001 through 2004 and as President from its inception in 1990 to 2001.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He currently serves as non-executive chairman of the board of tronc, Inc. (formerly known as Tribune Publishing Company); as lead independent director of the board of SIRIUS XM Holdings Inc., where he also serves on the audit committee; as a director of Yahoo, Inc., where he also serves on the compensation and leadership development committee; and as a director of TiVo Corporation, where he also serves on the compensation and strategic committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Hartenstein also served as a director of BRCM from June 2008 through January 2016; SanDisk Corporation from 2005 to May 2016; and Rovi Corporation from September 2015 until its acquisition by TiVo in September 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Hartensteins qualifications to serve on our Board include his business leadership and extensive senior management experience, including successfully creating and entering new markets, as well as his considerable public company directorial and governance experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (f) Check Kian Low Age 57 Director since December 2016
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Low was one of the founding partners and is a director of NewSmith Capital Partners LLP (NewSmith), an independent partnership providing corporate finance advice and investment management services, for which he manages the Asia Pacific offices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is also an owner, and has served as a director of, Cluny Capital Limited (BVI) since February 2007.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to founding NewSmith in 2003, Mr. Low served as Senior Vice-President and Member of the Executive Management Committee of Merrill Lynch & Co., as well as its Chairman for the Asia Pacific Region, where he held various positions since the start of his employment with that firm in October 1995.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Low serves as the lead independent director of Singapore Telecommunications Limited, a public company listed on the Singapore Stock Exchange.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He also serves on the board of directors of a number of private companies and is a trustee of the Singapore London School of Economics Trust and the Nanyang Technological University.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Low previously served as a director of the following public, Singapore listed companies: Neptune Orient Lines Limited from April 2011 to June 2016, Fibrechem Technologies Limited from January 2005 to September 2012 and Singapore Exchange Limited from July 2000 to October 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Lows qualifications to serve on our Board include his considerable public company directorial experience with Singapore-based companies, as well as his considerable executive management and financial and investment experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (g) Donald Macleod Age 68 Director since November 2007
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Macleod served as President and Chief Executive Officer of National Semiconductor Corporation (NSC) from November 2009 to September 2011, when NSC was acquired by Texas Instruments Incorporated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He served as its President and Chief Operating Officer from the beginning of 2005 until November 2009, and before that he held various other executive and senior management positions at the company including Executive Vice President and Chief Operating Officer and Executive Vice President, Finance and Chief Financial Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Macleod also served as the Chairman of the board of directors of NSC from May 2010 to September 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Macleod serves as
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Chairman of the board of directors of Intersil Corporation, where he also serves on its compensation and audit committees, and as a director of Knowles Corporation, where he also serves on its nominating & governance and compensation committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Macleod also serves on the board of directors of a number of private companies and business organizations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Macleods qualifications to serve on our Board include his more than 30 years of experience in senior management and executive positions in the semiconductor industry, both in Europe and in the United States, and his accounting and finance qualifications and experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Marks is the Chief Executive Officer of Executive Consultant, which he founded in 2013, where he advises business leaders on leadership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to this, Mr. Marks served in various senior management roles with Robert Bosch GmbH, which he originally joined in 1977 and where he remained until December 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Most recently, from 2006 until his departure in December 2011, Mr. Marks served as Chairman, President and Chief Executive Officer of Robert Bosch LLC, where he managed all of its business sectors in the Americas, and as a member of Board of Management of Robert Bosch GmbH, with responsibility for worldwide coordination for manufacturing and capital investment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to that he also served as a senior executive of Robert Bosch GmbH responsible for various divisions; automotive electronics, semiconductors, body electronics/electric drivers and energy systems.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Marks qualifications to serve on our Board include his extensive leadership experience in senior management and executive positions with a large, multinational organization, as well as his familiarity with operational and strategic issues relating to technology focused companies with international operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Henry Samueli, Ph.D.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Age 62 Chief Technical Officer and Director since February 2016
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Samueli has served as our Chief Technical Officer since February 1, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He was a co-founder of BRCM and served as its Chief Technical Officer from its inception in 1991 to May 2008 and from December 2009 through January 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Samueli also served as BRCMs Vice President of Research and Development from 1991 to May 2003 and as a technology advisor from May 2008 to December 2009.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Samueli has also been a Professor in the Electrical Engineering Department at the University of California, Los Angeles since 1985 (on leave of absence since 1995) and a Distinguished Adjunct Professor in the Electrical Engineering and Computer Science Department of the University of California, Irvine since 2003.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to BRCM, Dr. Samueli was the Chief Scientist and one of the founders of PairGain Technologies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From 1980 until 1985, he was employed in various engineering management positions in the Electronics and Technology Division of TRW, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Samueli is a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE), a Fellow of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences, and a Member of the National Academy of Engineering.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Samueli served as Chairman or Co-Chairman of the board of directors of BRCM from 1991 to May 2008 and from May 2011 to January 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He received a B.S., M.S. and Ph.D. in Electrical Engineering from the University of California, Los Angeles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is a named inventor in 75 U.S. patents.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Samuelis qualifications to serve on our Board include his over 35 years of advanced engineering and leadership experience in the fields of communications systems and digital signal processing.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, his co-founding of BRCM and his service as its Chief Technical Officer provide unique insights into, and understanding of, our operations, technologies and industry.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Low is our Singapore resident director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Due to the Singapore Companies Act requirement that we have at least one director who ordinarily resides in Singapore in office at all times, in the event that Mr. Low is not elected at the 2017 AGM, he will continue to serve as a director after the 2017 AGM until his qualifying successor (i.e., a Singapore resident director) is appointed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event that a director resigns from our Board or otherwise becomes unwilling or unable to serve after the mailing of this Proxy Statement but before the 2017 AGM, our intention would be to make a public announcement of such resignation and either leave such Board seat vacant or appoint a substitute nominee in accordance with our Constitution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If such Board seat were left vacant, this would reduce the number of director nominees to be elected at the 2017 AGM.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Votes received in respect of such director would not be counted in such circumstances.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event that we instead propose to elect a different director nominee at the 2017 AGM to fill any such vacancy, it is intended that the shares represented by the proxy will be voted for such substitute nominee as may be designated by our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are no family relationships between any of our directors or executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board recommends a vote FOR the election of each of the director nominees in Proposals 1(a) to (i) listed above to our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Constitution gives our Board general powers to manage our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board oversees and provides policy guidance on our strategic and business planning processes, oversees the conduct of our business by senior management and is principally responsible for the succession planning for our key executives, including our President and Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board held a total of 6 meetings during the fiscal year ended October 30, 2016 (Fiscal Year 2016).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During Fiscal Year 2016, each director attended at least 75% of the aggregate number of meetings of our Board and all committees of our Board on which he or she served, counting only those meetings during which such person was a member of our Board and of the relevant committee(s).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our independent directors meet at regularly scheduled executive sessions without management participation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has adopted a policy that encourages each director to attend the annual general meetings of our shareholders, but attendance is not required.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of our directors then serving attended our 2016 Annual General Meeting of Shareholders (2016 AGM).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board undertakes a review of the independence of each director and nominee for director and considers whether any director or nominee for director has a material relationship with us that could compromise his or her ability to exercise independent judgment in carrying out his or her responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has made the determination that transactions or relationships between us and an entity where a director or nominee for director serves as a non-employee director and/or is the beneficial owner, directly or indirectly of less than 10% of such entity, or where a director or nominee for director serves on a non-employee advisory board of, or in a non-employee advisory capacity to, such an entity are presumed immaterial for the purposes of assessing a directors independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In reviewing the directors independence, with respect to Mr. Hao our Board considered that
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) two entities affiliated with Silver Lake, where Mr. Hao is a Managing Partner and a Managing Director, beneficially owned an aggregate of 10,644,567 ordinary shares at the time of such determination and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) representatives of Silver Lake assisted us with the debt financing for the Acquisition of BRCM, for which no payment was made.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result of its review, our Board has determined that Messrs. Diller, Eggebrecht, Hao, Hartenstein, Low, Macleod and Marks, representing seven of our nine director nominees, as well as Ms. Page, are currently independent directors as defined under the applicable rules and regulations of the SEC and the Nasdaq Stock Market (Nasdaq).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our Board has determined that each of the members of:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Audit Committee meets the additional requirements for financial literacy, and satisfies the heightened independence standards established by the SEC and Nasdaq for membership of that committee; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Compensation Committee satisfies the heightened independence standards established by the SEC and Nasdaq for membership of that committee, and is a non-employee director within the meaning of Section 16 of the Exchange Act.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Committees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has an Audit Committee, a Compensation Committee, a Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee and an Executive Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each committee can engage outside experts, advisors and counsel to assist the committee in its work.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The table below provides the membership for each of the committees as of February 14, 2017, and the number of meetings held by each committee during Fiscal Year 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The functions performed by these committees, which are set forth in more detail in their respective charters, are summarized below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the Audit Committee, the Compensation Committee and the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee operates under a charter that satisfies the applicable standards of the SEC and Nasdaq.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The charters for all four committees are available in the Investor CenterCorporate GovernanceDocuments section of our website (http://investors.broadcom.com/phoenix.zhtml?c=203541&p=irol-govhighlights).

sentences.text: Audit Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is responsible for assisting our Board with its oversight responsibilities regarding the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the quality and integrity of our financial statements and internal controls;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the appointment, compensation, retention, qualifications and independence of our independent registered public accounting firm;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the performance of our internal audit function and independent registered public accounting firm;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: our compliance with legal and regulatory requirements; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: related party transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has determined that Mr. Macleod is an audit committee financial expert under applicable SEC rules, and has the equisite financial sophistication required by applicable Nasdaq rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee is responsible for:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: determining our executives base compensation and incentive compensation (other than that of our Chief Executive Officer);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: providing input and recommendations to the full Board regarding our Chief Executive Officers compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: designing (in consultation with management or our Board) and evaluating our compensation plans, policies and programs, and recommending same to our Board for approval; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: administering our equity-based plans and approving the terms of equity-based grants pursuant to those plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To the extent permitted by applicable law, our Constitution and the rules of the Nasdaq, the Compensation Committee may delegate its responsibilities to a subcommittee or to individual directors or executive officers, and may authorize members of our Huma Resources department to carry out certain administrative duties regarding our compensation programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For information on the processes and procedures followed by the Compensation Committee and our Board, and the role of its compensation consultant and our Chief Executive Officer, in the consideration and determination of executive compensation, see the Compensation Discussion and Analysis section beginning on page 28 of this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee is responsible for
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: identifying and recommending to our Board qualified candidates to become directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: overseeing the annual evaluation of our Board and its committees; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: taking a leadership role in shaping our corporate governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee will consider candidates for director who are recommended by its members, by other Board members and members of our management, as well as those identified by any third-party search firms retained by it to assist in identifying and evaluating possible candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee will also consider recommendations for director candidates submitted by our shareholders if they meet the specific criteria set forth under Shareholder Nominations to Our Board of Directors below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee will evaluate and recommend to our Board qualified candidates for election, re-election or appointment to our Board, as applicable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When evaluating director candidates, the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee seeks to ensure that our Board has the requisite skills, experience and expertise and that its members consist of persons with appropriately diverse and independent backgrounds.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee will consider all aspects of a candidates qualifications in the context of the needs of Broadcom, including: independence from management; personal and professional integrity, ethics and values; experience and expertise as an officer in corporate management; experience in our industry and international business and familiarity with Broadcom; experience as a board member of another publicly traded company; practical and mature business judgment; current Board size and composition and the extent to which a candidate would fill a present need on our Board; and the other ongoing commitments and obligations of the candidate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee does not have any minimum criteria for director candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consideration of new director candidates will typically involve a series of internal discussions, review of information concerning candidates and interviews with selected candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Low, who joined our Board in December 2016, was first suggested as a prospective Board candidate by one of our independent directors and was then evaluated by the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee according to its practice described above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Executive Committee has the authority, among other things and subject to specified limitations, to review and approve on behalf of our Board:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: investments, acquisitions, dispositions and capital expenditures;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: new or incremental debt financings or borrowings, or amendments thereto, or refinancings thereof, including convertible debt; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: treasury, cash management and other banking matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Executive Committee may review and provide recommendations to our Board on matters requiring full Board pproval, including:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: business opportunities, strategies and proposals, and other strategic matters;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: business plans, annual budgets, targets, operational plans, capital structure and dividend policy;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: proposed transactions that exceed the Executive Committees approval thresholds; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: efficient organization and management structure of our Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Leadership Structure and Role in Risk Management
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board believes that Broadcom and its shareholders are best served by a Board leadership structure in which the roles of the Chief Executive Officer and the Chairman of the Board are held by different individuals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under this structure our Chief Executive Officer is generally responsible for setting the strategic direction of our Company and for the day-to-day leadership of our operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chairman provides strong independent leadership to assist our Board in fulfilling its role of overseeing the management of Broadcom and our risk management practices, approves the agenda for meetings of our Board and presides over Board meetings and over the meetings of our independent directors in executive session.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Currently, Mr. Tan serves as our President and Chief Executive Officer and Mr. Diller, an independent director, serves as Chairman of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board is responsible for overseeing the management of risks facing our Company, both as a whole and through its committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board regularly reviews and discusses with management information regarding our operations, liquidity and credit, as well as the risks associated with each.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee reviews and discusses with management significant financial, legal and regulatory risks and the steps management takes to monitor, control and report such exposures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It also oversees our periodic enterprise-wide risk evaluations conducted by our management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee oversees management of risks relating to our compensation plans and programs for executives and employees in general.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee oversees management of risks associated with Board governance, director independence and conflicts of interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional details regarding the responsibilities of each of these committees are discussed in more detail above, under Board Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committees report regularly to our Board on matters relating to the specific areas of risk the committees oversee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Members of management periodically report on our risk management policies and practices to the relevant committees and to the full Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Committee Interlocks and Insider Participation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The current members of the Compensation Committee, Messrs. Macleod, Diller, Eggebrecht and Hartenstein, are not, and have never been, officers or employees of Broadcom.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During Fiscal Year 2016, none of our executive officers served on the board of directors or compensation committee of any other entity that has one or more executive officers serving as a member of our Board or the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risk Assessment and Compensation Practices
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our management conducted its annual review of our compensation policies and practices for our employees, as they relate to our risk management, in January 2017, and reported their findings to the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management has concluded that our compensation policies and practices (described in more detail under Compensation Discussion and Analysis and Executive Compensation below) balance short- and long-term goals and awards, as well as the mix of the cash and equity components.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based upon this review, management believes the elements of our compensation programs do not encourage unnecessary or excessive risk- taking, and are not reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on us in the future.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholder Communications With Our Board
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders of our ordinary shares may communicate with our Board at the following address:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors Broadcom Limited c/o General Counsel Avago Technologies U.S. Inc. 1320 Ridder Park Drive San Jose, CA 95131 U.S.A.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Communications are distributed to our Board or to any individual director, as appropriate, depending on the facts and ircumstances outlined in the communication.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Communications that are unduly hostile, threatening, illegal or similarly unsuitable will be excluded, with the provision that any communication that is excluded will be made available to any director upon request.
